sub_title: Full Time Master's in Cyber Security at Intellfence
summary: A highly motivated and confident manager witch exceptional multi-tasking and organizational skills. Extensive experienced in identifying the users needs. Excellent in aligning IT infrastructure and support with the various business units. Use assets effective and efficient as possible to achieve cost savings. Ability to standardize processes/procedures and align them with global policies. Strong communication and negotiation skills. Able to quickly understand the mission, vision and values of an organization. Deliver ongoing metrics and reports to higher management. Ability to work under high pressure.

profile_positions.title: Full Time Master's in Cyber Security

profile_positions.description:
EP&C is a law firm specialized in protecting your ideas and commercial assets by patents, trademarks and designs. From our offices in Rijswijk, Amsterdam, Utrecht and Turnhout (BE), we work for clients who are based in Netherlands and Belgium, but also in other countries like the USA, China, Japan and Korea. 

Our patent attorneys and trademark attorneys are registered legal professionals, who are genuinely interested in your technology and your business. They are supported by teams of officially qualified formalities officers. 

As the IT Manager I advise business on technology and how it can help them perform better. Lead migrations and upgrades of servers and infrastructure. Leading and motivating a professional IT team of highly motivated people.
profile_positions.title: IT Manager

profile_positions.description: Streamline various IT processes. Negotiate and create new SLA with currently outsourced IT Company. Reviewed current ISP contracts for the 4 different sites. Reviewed the current purchasing partners for software and hardware. Reviewed contracts and applied changes where possible to safe money. Resolved remote and mobile issues with 3 library buses. Resolved structural ERP problems they have had coped with the last few years. This created a more stable IT environment at DeBieb. Started a major  250K  savings project by migrating to a PaaS solution in the cloud. Selected new cheaper and better distributors. Helped migrating the inter- and intranet website to the latest platform, off-site,  resulting in a more stable and safer website.
profile_positions.title: IT Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Select business partners for hardware  and software solutions for the clothing manufacturing industry.
Ensure reliable data connections. Support the design department in aligning IT with their constant innovation requirements and smooth operation. Equip a new manufacturing site with data connections and network along with workstations and camera security in Bulgaria.
profile_positions.title: IT Project Manager

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the design, creation and maintenance of IT services within the organization. Ensured support was delivered as per agreed in SLA. Identify requirements timely. Identifying appropriate solutions.Apply changes and communicate clearly where needed. Resolving issues that may arise within the team or between the team and departments or external partners.
profile_positions.title: IT Service Manager

profile_positions.description: Proactively managed risks and issues. Implemented effective and sustainable actions to reduce negative impact on the business. Focal point for management, users ad other stakeholders during and prior changes. Track and report issues(root cause). Monitor changes and report their impacts. analyze and asses RFC's. Work with global teams to implement scheduled changes.
profile_positions.title: IT Project Change Manager

profile_positions.description: Evaluate suppliers based on price, quality, and delivery speed. Negotiated financial and operational lease contracts. Analyzed price proposals, financial reports, and other information to determine reasonable prices were paid. Acted as buyer for EMEA in regards to IT related products such as hardware and software. Evaluated and monitored contracts to be sure that vendors and supplies complied with the terms and conditions.
profile_positions.title: IT Purchasing Manager

profile_positions.description:
Managed a team of 7 in 4 sites within EMEA. Coached and mentored team members including conducting performance reviews. Analyzed reports and metrics to understand opportunities. Standardized local support processes to apply to global standards policies. Acted as liaison between management and IT. Gathered requirements from the business through regular on management meetings. Translated business goals and customer needs into prioritized actions to meet full customer satisfaction.Partnered successfully with business units to produce positive 
outcome. Ensured maximal uptime of systems and the infrastructure.
profile_positions.title: IT Service Desk Manager

profile_positions.description: Responsible for network infrastructure and support. Manage 4 data centers in EMEA. Responsible for daily backups. Focal point for the complete sales force in 16 countries. Ensured alignment of security protocols.Managed availability of internet, WiFi and telecom in the various offices. Participated in global IT projects. Responsible for the LAN/WAN environment. Member of the CAB team. First point of contact for ISP and telecom providers. Worked with vendors to resolve or prevent network outages and periods of reduced performance. High availability and disaster recovery planning. Providing capabilities to ensure application servers and network can function in the event of a disaster.Deploying improvements and fixes to the network and applications infrastructure. Prepared weekly reports and metrics for IT management.
profile_positions.title: Network/Desktop and Telecom Supervisor

profile_positions.description: Server management for applications and infrastructure configuration, maintenance, upgrades, patching and repair. Configuration, management, break/fix, applications installation & configuration, upgrades of company approved desktop and laptop devices. Creation and authorization of user profiles on all systems. Software application licensing and management. Mobile device and cell phone telecommunication management assigning, managing, cell phone contracts, and phone numbers. Provisioning for mobile device approved by the organization. Providing for BYOD access to the network. Workplace management in the offices and warehouses. Systems/servers patch management and upgrades. Prepared weekly reports and metrics for IT management.
profile_positions.title: Network/Desktop and Telecom Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Solving user rights problems. Setup accounts and assign correct
privileges. UAT testing. Resolving urgent and immediate requests by 
various users. Record incidents and escalate where needed. Work closely with DBA
member in upgrade and migration projects. Work with software vendors 
to minimize downtime.
profile_positions.title: Senior Application Support Engineer

profile_positions.description: Daily server checks. Backup and storage checks on hardware errors for Novell, Windows and Unix platforms. Firmware and patch management. Data center maintenance. Install new hardware, Replace faulty/broken hardware. Worked with Backup Excec, CommVault and EMC Networker.
profile_positions.title: Datacenter Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Review invoices and book them into the system. Sort,/organize/match bills 
and check demands; set invoices up for payment. Process Expense reports. Responsible for payment of  invoices, expense reports and salary. Resolve bill discrepancies; vendor document maintenance; correspond along with vendors and  respond to inquiries; produce month-,quarter- and year-end reporting and reconciliations.
profile_positions.title: Accounts Payable Specialist
